name: IMM Defense
description: This is a classic tower defense game. The alien ship is ready to invade this lovely planet. We need to use various weapons to prevent them from reaching the destination.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 630 or Intel HD Graphics or better Storage: 100 MB available space
